home.welcome-description: On this website, you will find a selection of my most notable web development projects, information about myself, and details on how to contact me.

blog.title: Blog API
blog.details: A full-stack blog application made with Next JS for the front-end and Express JS for the back-end.
list: Created a REST API as the back-end with Express JS.

shopping.title: Shopping Cart
shopping.details: An e-commerce front-end application, made with React and Next JS.
list: Utilized Next.js for routing and optimization of images and fonts.
Implemented React context to avoid prop drilling.

memory.title: Memory Game
memory.details: A memory game front-end application, made with React.
list: Learned how to use React hooks and lifecycle methods.
